# Composer dependencies
/vendor/
composer.lock

# Database configuration (IMPORTANT: Keep this private)
config/database.php

# Environment files
.env
.env.local
.env.production

# IDE files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# Log files
*.log
logs/

# Cache files
cache/
tmp/

# Upload directories (if any)
uploads/
images/uploads/

# Session files
sessions/

# Backup files
*.bak
*.backup
*.sql

# Node modules (if you use any frontend tools)
node_modules/
package-lock.json

# PHP specific
*.php~
